publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1244 Colin Campbell: Democracy in Azerbaijan-That the Parliament notes the efforts of those political parties in Azerbaijan which are working for the establishment of genuine democracy, with freedom of speech and fair elections free of corruption; supports those parties in their ongoing struggle, and deplores any measure that denies the electorate the right to vote for the party or individual of their choice. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-1244 Democracy in Azerbaijan (lodged on 4 October 2000) Mr Jamie Stone*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Michael Russell*

S1M-1244 Colin Campbell: Democracy in Azerbaijan—That the Parliament notes the efforts of those political parties in Azerbaijan which are working for the establishment of genuine democracy, with freedom of speech and fair elections free of corruption; supports those parties in their ongoing struggle, and deplores any measure that denies the electorate the right to vote for the party or individual of their choice. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Jamie Stone, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Andrew Welsh, Michael Russell, Richard Lochhead*, Fiona McLeod*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-1244 Democracy in Azerbaijan (lodged on 4 October 2000) Shona Robison*, Andrew Wilson*, Robin Harper*, Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1244 Democracy in Azerbaijan (lodged on 4 October 2000) Dr Winnie Ewing*
